thread.section_title: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brushy Mountain Bee Farm | brushymountainbeefarm.com | 3 of 154
thread.title: DJ
thread.title_full: Brushy Mountain Bee Farm reviewed by DJ

author: DJ
title: DJ
text: As a novice with Orchard Bees Im not an authority but my order from Brush Mountain went pretty well. The laminates I ordered were backordered but they called me and did a good job of keeping me informed on the status of my purchase. Everything came superbly packed. I refrigerated the bees and built a house for the laminates. The laminates looks to be very nicely built and the bees were packed and wrapped in a cold pack. There prices seemed as good or better than any other stores I looked at. The cacoons seem very pricey once you see how small and few bees you actually get. I've not set the bees out yet so I can not vouch for the mortality rate. Overall though they seem like a solid company.
